title: Suffix Equal Prefix
text: There is a curious boy in Noapara village, his name is “MODON”.  He wrote a line of small letters only. Now, he want to know how many proper suffix is also prefix of that line. Proper suffix is a suffix of a text whose length is less than the original text. Now you have to help “MODON”.InputInput starts with an integerT (≤ 50), denoting the number of test cases.Each case contains a stringSwhere 1≤ length(S) ≤ 106.OutputFor each case, print the case number and the answer .ExampleInput:3abababaaaaabcabcOutput:Case 1: 2Case 2: 3Case 3: 1
